title: bitcoinhistorian
author: bitcoinhistorian
content: Hey Everyone,I have seen references to Martti's first email in Digital Gold as discussed in this link - https://www.theverge.com/2015/6/10/8751933/the-shy-college-student-who-helped-build-bitcoin-into-a-globalAre there any public copies of these emails?Thanks

comments.author: Dave1
comments.body: Well if you look closely, Martti Malmi = siriusI guess that is a start if you wanted to investigate what you are looking for.Satoshi even recognized and thank him here:https://satoshi.nakamotoinstitute.org/emails/bitcoin-list/29/
